vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τρύφαινα, -ης, ἡ
Tryphæna: Rom.16:12 (see Lft., Phi., 175 f.; MM, xxv).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.12
§ Tryphena, "dainty"
Tryphaena, (Proper name), Rom. 16:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
土非拿 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "毫華的"
一個女基督徒 (羅16:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
土非拿 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "毫华的"
一个女基督徒 (罗16:12)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Try-phe-nơ; Try-phê-na là một người làm việc cho Chúa
